QuestData.Title: Crush 'Em All
QuestData.Description:
The mooring platform will be our best launching point to access the necropolis above. But one more fight remains before us.
Enforcer Borgulla oversees all of the work efforts that take place here. We'll need to eliminate her if we are to proceed unhindered.
She is a formidable foe. It appears Ansid has kept some of his explosives on his person. Let us utilize this advantage.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: The taskmaster of the Ossein Foundry.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Ansid's Explosive to kill Enforcer Borgulla.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet with Khaliiq in the Ossein Foundry.
QuestData.RewardText: Your strength never fails to impress me.
